customer_name: T W R C Wildlife Center

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
There is not a formal arrangement with the veterinarian that oversees the facility at this time. Without formal
arrangements, there is no assurance that the animal is receiving proper care from a veterinarian. The facility needs to
provide written documentation that they employ a veterinarian under formal arrangements for the regulated species on
site.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
BRENTON COX, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
There is not a formal arrangement with the veterinarian  that oversees the facility at this time. Without formal 
arrangements, there is no assurance that the animal is receiving proper care from a veterinarian.  The facility needs to 
provide written documentation that they employ a veterinarian  under formal arrangements for the regulated species on 
site. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
BRENTON COX, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd  Section
